thread.title: Long-lost African masterpiece found in London flat

title: Long-lost African masterpiece found in London flat
text:
Long-lost African masterpiece found in London flat Thursday, February 08, 2018 - 01:40 
A portrait of a Nigerian princess that was lost for more than 40 years has been rediscovered in a flat in London. It will now be sold at auction. Anna Bevan reports ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A portrait of a Nigerian princess that was lost for more than 40 years has been rediscovered in a flat in London. It will now be sold at auction. Anna Bevan reports Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2EuOkBu
